name: OFL Sorts Mill Goudy TT
description: A ‘revival’ of Goudy Oldstyle and Italic, with features among which are small capitals (in the roman only), oldstyle and lining figures, superscripts and subscripts, fractions, ligatures, class-based kerning, case-sensitive forms and capital spacing. There is support for many languages that use latin script.
author: Barry Schwartz
